name: Tiny Kingdoms (Canceled)
blurb: Tiny Kingdoms is an RPG tactical battle game featuring a guest game designer - you!

rewards.reward: Mon-ayy! You will receive $7 worth of in-game currency. You will also receive a bronze badge beside your name so you can brag about being an early supporter!
Buddy System. 25 in-game currency for you! Got a special friend? Okay, 5 for them! PLUS, early forum access and a bronze badge beside your name.

PERMANENT XP Boost, Wizard & Game Credit. Receive a 5% XP boost forever and ever, as well as seeing your name in the game credits and a Wizard Character! 40 in-game credits for you, 10 for a friend, early forum access, and a bronze badge.
!!! SUPER SPECIAL EARLY BIRD SPECIAL !!! \r\n\r\nThe first 50 people will pay only $37 for everything in the $45 tier!!!!
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL!! \r\n\r\nThe first 100 people will receive everything from the $45 tier for only $40!

Kick Face, Kickass Art! Receive exclusive Kickstarter character Kick Face and the TK Digital Artbook! PLUS, the Wizard character, a permanent 10% XP boost, 60 in-game credits, 15 for a friend, early forum access, your name in credits and a bronze badge. STRETCH GOALS START HERE!
!!! SUPER SPECIAL EARLY BIRD SPECIAL !!! \r\n\r\nThe first 50 people will pay only $80 for everything in the $100 tier!!!!
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL!!\r\n\r\nThe first 50 people will get everything from the $100 tier for only $90! HURRY!

Mad SWAG! TK soundtrack download, unique TK buttons and Viking character. PLUS, permanent 15% XP boost, 125 in-game currency, 25 for a friend, Kick Face & Wizard characters, Digital Artbook, early forum access, your name in credits and a SILVER badge.

Poster & Dragon.. roar! Get yourself an awesomesauce gigantic signed poster and exclusive Kickstarter Dragon character. PLUS, permanent 15% XP boost, 325 in-game currency, 50 for a friend, TK soundtrack download, TK buttons, Viking, Kick Face & Wizard characters, Digital Artbook, early forum access, your name in credits and a silver badge.

Enter the exclusive Kickstarter World! This exclusive World Zone is only accessible by Kickstarter backers of this tier or higher. PLUS, permanent 20% XP boost, 675 in-game currency, 100 for a friend, TK soundtrack download, TK buttons, signed poster, exclusive Kick Face, Viking, Dragon & Wizard characters, Digital Artbook, early forum access, your name in credits and a silver badge.

Name an enemy! Want to exact revenge on that nasty ex? Well, with this tier you can name an enemy anything you want (SFW, of course). PLUS, UNLIMITED stamina, permanent 25% XP boost, 1,400 in-game currency, 150 for a friend, World Zone access, TK soundtrack download, TK buttons, signed poster, exclusive Kick Face, Viking, Dragon & Wizard characters, Digital Artbook, early forum access, your name in credits and a GOLD badge.

Bring your worst nightmares to life and create an enemy - as crazy or mean as you want! PLUS, name an ADDITIONAL enemy, unlimited stamina, a permanent 30% XP boost, 3,625 in-game currency, 250 for a friend, World Zone access, TK soundtrack download, TK buttons, signed poster, exclusive Kick Face, Viking, Dragon & Wizard characters, Digital Artbook, early forum access, your name in credits and a gold badge.

Legacy! Here is your chance to be immortalized by designing a character and naming it anything you want (SFW). Additionally, name and create a mean, nasty enemy, and name one of our enemies! PLUS, unlimited stamina, permanent 30% XP boost, 7,500 in-game currency, 1,000 for a friend, World Zone access, TK soundtrack download, TK buttons, signed poster, exclusive Kick Face, Viking, Dragon & Wizard characters, Digital Artbook, early forum access, your name in credits and a gold badge.

Live the life of a Viking! With this tier, we will bring you out to our HQ all expenses paid (North American only). You can sit in a design meeting and join us for a board game tourney! Because of your epic contribution, you will also be listed as an Executive Producer in the credits and receive an iPad Mini with a beta of TK. PLUS, unlimited stamina, permanent 40% XP boost, 14,000 in-game currency, 2,000 for a friend, design & name a character AND enemy, name an additional enemy, World Zone access, TK VINYL soundtrack, TK buttons, signed poster, exclusive Kick Face, Viking, Dragon & Wizard characters, Digital Artbook, early forum access and a PLATINUM badge.
